title: lumin Careers

blocks.careers_main_subtitle: Our team is passionate about what we do, and we are excited to develop a team of mission-aligned individuals! If you like working with a purpose to make our society more energy-efficient, and enjoy being part of a small, but growing team, we want to hear from you.

blocks.careers_diversity_subtitle: United by our passion, empowered by our differences; Lumin is building a platform to accelerate the world’s adoption of clean energy. We strive to provide a safe environment, where all differences are welcomed, accepted, and celebrated. We continuously work to involve not just the communities we serve today, but all communities as we move forward, because the future of renewable energy must be inclusive of everyone.

careers_diversity_lists.title: Remote / Flexible Work
careers_diversity_lists.text: Our results-focused environment allows flexible/remote work around a 9-5 EST schedule.
